```{python}
#| label: fig-pll-frac-n-block
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Block diagram of a fractional-N PLL. The VCO signal is divided by a sequence of integer divider values div[k] with (on average) is given by $N.f$, where $N$ is the integer part of the divider value, and $f$ the fractional part of the divider."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    dsp.Oscillator()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit).label(r'$f_\mathrm{ref}$', 'top')
    pfd = dsp.Square().label('PFD\nCP', loc='center')
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit).label('phase\nerror', 'top')
    dsp.Filter(response='lp')
    dsp.Arrow().length(d.unit).label('tuning\nvoltage', 'top')
    dsp.Oscillator().label('VCO', loc='top', ofst=(0, 0.2))
    dsp.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot()
    d.push()
    dsp.Arrow().right(d.unit/2).label(r'$f_\mathrm{out}$', 'right')
    d.pop()
    dsp.Line().down(d.unit)
    dsp.Arrow().left(d.unit*1.5)
    mmd = dsp.Square().label('MMD', loc='center')
    dsp.Line().tox(pfd.S).label(r'$f_\mathrm{out} / \text{div}[k-1]$', 'top').dot()
    d.push()
    dsp.Arrow().up().to(pfd.S)
    d.pop()
    elm.Line().down(d.unit*3/4)
    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit/2)
    dsm = dsp.Square().label('DSM')
    elm.Line().tox(mmd.S).label(r'$\text{div}[k]$')
    elm.Arrow().up().to(mmd.N)
    elm.Arrow().down(d.unit/4).at(dsm.S).reverse().label(r'$N.f$', 'left')
```
